name: Breakfast Fruits Burrito
description: A sweet chef who has incredible cooking skills has invited us to join her in her kitchen to learn how to make a fruity breakfast recipe. The name of the recipe is Fruits Burrito. If any of your family members want to eat something special at breakfast, you can serve this recipe. Since we are cooking some tasty meals for our family, we may not be able to attend the cooking session. Since you have some time to learn new recipes, you can take part in the cooking session and learn to make Fruits Burrito from the chef.
